text:
e="preserve">Outram Park MRT Station (EW16/NE3/TE17) is an MRT Station in Singapore. It is an interchange station on the East West MRT Line and North East MRT Line. In 2021 it will also be an interchange for the Thomson-East Coast MRT Line, where it would become one of three triple line interchanges in Singapore.
Following Stations.
Previous: Tanjong Pagar (EW15)Next: Tiong Bahru (EW17)
Previous: HarbourFront (NE1/CC29)Next: Chinatown (NE4/DT19)
Previous: Havelock (TE16)Next: Maxwell (TE18)
